results.title: DPP-4 inhibitors in the management of type 2 diabetes: a critical review of head-to-head trials.
results.text_hl: Direct comparisons with active @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@-lowering comparators in drug-naive @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ have demonstrated that @GENE_DPP4 @GENE_1803 @@@DPP-4@@@ inhibitors exert slightly less pronounced @<m>DISEASE_Usher_syndrome_type_1C</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536486 @@@HbA(1c)@@@ reduction than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (with the advantage of better gastrointestinal tolerability) and similar @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@-lowering effects as with a @CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@thiazolidinedione@@@ (@CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@TZD@@@; with the advantage of no @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@).

citations.NLM: Scheen AJ. DPP-4 inhibitors in the management of type 2 diabetes: a critical review of head-to-head trials. Diabetes Metab. 2012 Apr;38(2):89-101. PMID: 22197148
